posts.post_title: FS: T206 Sodgrass dual signed !2  team desigs looks good JSA
posts.post_content:
I hate to part with this! it's my only T206 auto....

I am looking to sell or trade for a cobb.....cash works also(have some cardboard debt)...


1910 sweet caporal 350 fact # 30 SGC "AUTH" (card a little short) FRED SNODGRASS "  JSA SIGNED TWICE!!  PLUS NY GIANTS AND BOSTON BRAVES WRITTEN ON CARD!:eek:


If you are going to own an t206 auto, this is the card to do it!  this card I obtained from a very reputable board member....  it is the real deal.....with all the fakes out there, this is an exception.....I have had many members review it also.....no refunds on graded cards....I am selling as is....card looks good though!


the card-  has "FRED C. SNODGRASS "   AUTOED ON THE FRONT AND BACK....(the front auto is a little light)  the back auto is extremely clear and bold felt tip.....

A BONUS -  NEVER BEFORE SEEN! "BOSTON BRAVES" and "N. Y. GIANTS" written both large and neatly under his auto!!!....:eek::eek:

2 autoes ! front and back.....both team and design written...

4 lines !!  WOW

$2500.00 or trade/cobb / combo

pm or email me

[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]

This one is legit and sick!!


VALENTINE SPECIAL.....dropping this $800 BUCKS :eek:


$1700   FOR ALL THIS WRITING!
